mapper.content:
ByteBake Cookies

Hello {{23.`1`}},

We are writing to confirm that your order with ByteBake Cookies has been successfully cancelled, as requested.

Order ID:
Item: {{23.`3`}}
Quantity: {{23.`4`}}

No further action is required from your side. If any charges were applicable, the necessary steps will be taken according to our standard process.

Please note that this cancellation does not affect your ability to place a new order with us in the future. We would be happy to assist you again.

If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to reply to this email.

With appreciation,
ByteBake Cookies Team

Stay connected: Facebook | Instagram
